moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6: I am currently trying to expand my opening diversity.
moves.6. Be3: Ne3 would prevent material loss. This at least prevents some trade-offs..
moves.10. Bxe2 Nc6: I start my way to a won endgame.
moves.11. O-O Nb4: Not very useful thanks to white's next move.
moves.14. Bf2 Re8 15. Re1 Nf4 16. Bg4+: Nc3 would have been better, developing a piece.
moves.17. Rxe8+: White is forced to trade off to avoid material loss.
